text: Tara balale -- ''yadi se curi kare thake tara bha'i'o to era age curi karechila.’’ Takhana i'usupha eti nijera antare'i gopana rekhechilena ebam tini ta tadera kache prakasa karena ni. Tini balalena -- ''tomara ara'o hina abasthate rayecha, ara allah bhala janena tomara ya aropa karacha se-sanbandhe.’’
